long_description: These Energizer 123 lithium batteries deliver long-lasting power to keep up with the demands of today's high-tech cameras and flash units, shot after shot. 3V batteries continue to perform in extreme temperatures, ranging from -40degF(-40degC) to 140degF (60degC). Leak-resistant Energizer 123 lithium batteries hold power for up to 10 years when not in use.
short_description: These Energizer 123 lithium batteries deliver long-lasting power to keep up with the demands of today's high-tech cameras and flash units, shot after shot.
